Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and membrane-active mechanism of tryptophan zipper-like β-hairpin antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Xu L, Chou S, Wang J, Shao C, Li W, Zhu X, Shan A

Literature.Title: The novel β-hairpin antimicrobial peptide D-G(RF)3 demonstrates exceptional antibacterial efficacy
Literature.Author: Li B, Liu Y, Yan P, Ouyang X, Ba Z, Wang Y, Yang T, Yu Z, Ren B, Zhong C, Liu H, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=512 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=32µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM)
